publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4518 Richard Lochhead: Portessie Primary School - My Friend Needs A Teacher Campaign—That the Parliament supports Portessie Primary School in Moray and other schools throughout Scotland as they campaign for global education through the My Friend Needs A Teacher campaign; supports the aims of the campaign to provide primary education by 2015 for the 100 million children who currently receive no form of teaching; congratulates the pupils and the school for their involvement in such a good cause, and agrees that the campaign should receive the backing of the Parliament.

S2M-4518 Richard Lochhead: Portessie Primary School - My Friend Needs A Teacher Campaign—That the Parliament supports Portessie Primary School in Moray and other schools throughout Scotland as they campaign for global education through the My Friend Needs A Teacher campaign; supports the aims of the campaign to provide primary education by 2015 for the 100 million children who currently receive no form of teaching; congratulates the pupils and the school for their involvement in such a good cause, and agrees that the campaign should receive the backing of the Parliament. Supported by: Eleanor Scott*, Christine Grahame*, Robin Harper*, Ms Sandra White*, Brian Adam*, Rob Gibson*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Bruce Crawford*
S2M-4518 Portessie Primary School - My Friend Needs A Teacher Campaign (lodged on 7 June 2006) Ms Maureen Watt*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-4518 Portessie Primary School - My Friend Needs A Teacher Campaign (lodged on 7 June 2006) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S2M-4518 Portessie Primary School - My Friend Needs A Teacher Campaign (lodged on 7 June 2006) Michael Matheson*
S2M-4518 Portessie Primary School - My Friend Needs A Teacher Campaign (lodged on 7 June 2006) Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Dave Petrie*
S2M-4518 Portessie Primary School - My Friend Needs A Teacher Campaign (lodged on 7 June 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4518 Portessie Primary School - My Friend Needs A Teacher Campaign (lodged on 7 June 2006) Linda Fabiani*
